qwoptics_basic_example

Minimal working example demonstrating basic QW optics functionality.

This example shows how to: 1. Initialize the QW optics module 2. Convert propagation fields to QW fields 3. Calculate polarization from coherence matrix 4. Convert back to propagation space

Purpose: Minimal working example that proves the functions work Style: Hard-coded data, immediate visualization Audience: Someone copy-pasting to verify installation
